info.name: /lolchecknick
info.description: Check a disponibility time from a nickname.
examples: /lolchecknick BR1 badda boom - Check the disponibility time from the nick `badda boom` in the `Brazilian` server.
/lolchecknick KR tching tchong - Check the disponibility time from the nick `tching tchong` in the `Korean` server.

doesntExist: The nick **{0}** doesn't exist, this means that the nick is available to use.
availableTime: The nick **{0}** will be available in **{1}** days if continue inactive.
